Class CameraImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.ControllerIoImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.DeviceImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.CameraImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, Camera, ControllerIO, Device, Storable
public class CameraImpl extends DeviceImpl implements Camera
CameraImpl represents a single roadside camera.
Author:
Douglas Lau, Tim Johnson, Travis Swanston, John L. Stanley - SRF Consulting

    • getPtzUser

      public String getPtzUser()

      Specified by:

    • getPtzTimestamp

      public long getPtzTimestamp()
      Get Epoch timestamp when latest camera motion (PTZ or camera preset-recall) was attempted. Returns zero if no attempt has been made.
      Specified by:
      getPtzTimestamp in interface Camera
